# SCYLLA-CLASS DESTROYER
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Medium
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 1-3
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] Antimatter Engine (AME)
[color=#a4885c]Expeditions:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] Present [NORMAL]
"Scylla-class Destroyers are refitted military warships repurposed for private use. Designed for frontal assault, they carry heavy armor and forward-facing weaponry, but are vulnerable to flanking. Their post-military conversions often leave rear systems exposed or lightly armored."
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the Antimatter Engine (AME) generator is functional (View below.) - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is charging. - Check that the Engineering/Research APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check that the APC unit's accross several rooms Breakers are toggled on. - Check that the Bridge APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on.
## 1.2. Antimatter Engine (AME) reactor unit.
- Check that the AME control device is anchored to the floor and connected to a 3x3 containment shielding structure. - Check that the AME control device is connected to the cable terminal of your SMES via HV. - Check the fuel remaining of the generator unit. - Enable Injection. (Note: AMEs automatically generate power equivalent to demand.)
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the O2 canister is anchored to the BLUE connector port. - Check that the N2 canister is anchored to the RED connector port. - Check that the gas mixer is set to the correct mixing ratio (~22% Oxygen, ~78% Nitrogen). - Check that the gas mixer is set to 101.325kPa. - Enable gas mixer.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Enable waste loop pump(if applicable).
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
## Sidenotes
* - Scylla-class destroyer ships are equipped with shield systems, make sure they are running smoothly.
* - The CYREXA turrets don a somewhat outdated acquisition system and have a tendency to bounce shots off of Scylla's cockpit room. This can be prevented by aiming well.
